projects.title: CALENDAR KEMPINSKI 2025
mainContent: IN THIS VIDEO GAME, CRAFTED IN UNITY AS A FINAL  year project for BDDI AT GOBELINS SCHOOL OF THE IMAGE, EMBARK ON AN EPIC AND EMOTIONAL JOURNEY THROUGH THE EYES OF TWIN BROTHERS. TAKE THE TIME TO LOSE YOURSELF IN THIS BEAUTIFUL CELL-SHADED WORLD.

IN THIS VIDEO GAME, CRAFTED IN UNITY AS A FINAL year project for BDDI AT GOBELINS SCHOOL OF THE IMAGE, EMBARK ON AN EPIC AND EMOTIONAL JOURNEY THROUGH THE EYES OF TWIN BROTHERS. TAKE THE TIME TO LOSE YOURSELF IN THIS BEAUTIFUL CELL-SHADED WORLD, ENTIRELY CREATED BY OUR TEAM, AND LET YOUR IMAGINATION TAKE FLIGHT. EXPERIENCE A UNIQUE JOURNEY THROUGH THE DREAMLIKE LANDSCAPES OF STRO

details.credits: IBRAHIMA KABA ; LINA ABBOUSAIR ; JESSY RANGASAMY

projects.title: CALENDAR ETAM 2025
mainContent: A DIGITAL ADVENT CALENDAR CRAFTED FOR ETAM, THE ICONIC FRENCH LINGERIE AND FASHION BRAND. THIS IMMERSIVE WEB EXPERIENCE INVITES USERS TO DISCOVER DAILY SURPRISES THROUGH ELEGANT ANIMATIONS AND INTERACTIVE ELEMENTS.

DESIGNED TO CELEBRATE THE HOLIDAY SEASON, THE EXPERIENCE COMBINES REFINED AESTHETICS WITH PLAYFUL INTERACTIONS. EACH DAY REVEALS EXCLUSIVE CONTENT, SPECIAL OFFERS, AND CURATED SELECTIONS, CREATING A MEMORABLE JOURNEY THROUGH THE FESTIVE SPIRIT OF THE BRAND.

projects.title: CHANEL ATELIER HAUTE JOAILLERIE
mainContent: AN EXCLUSIVE DIGITAL SHOWCASE FOR CHANEL'S HAUTE JOAILLERIE ATELIER, BRINGING THE MAISON'S FINEST CREATIONS TO LIFE THROUGH AN IMMERSIVE 3D EXPERIENCE. EVERY DETAIL OF THE JEWELRY PIECES IS RENDERED WITH METICULOUS PRECISION.

THE EXPERIENCE TRANSPORTS VISITORS INTO THE HEART OF CHANEL'S CREATIVE UNIVERSE, WHERE CRAFTSMANSHIP MEETS INNOVATION. THROUGH ELEGANT TRANSITIONS AND REFINED INTERACTIONS, USERS EXPLORE THE EXTRAORDINARY WORLD OF HIGH JEWELRY, DISCOVERING THE STORIES AND ARTISTRY BEHIND EACH ICONIC PIECE.

projects.title: MACIF HOUSE INSURANCE
mainContent: AN INTERACTIVE WEB EXPERIENCE DEVELOPED FOR MACIF, ONE OF FRANCE'S LEADING INSURANCE PROVIDERS. THIS PROJECT TRANSFORMS THE CONCEPT OF HOME INSURANCE INTO A VISUALLY ENGAGING AND EDUCATIONAL DIGITAL JOURNEY.

USERS NAVIGATE THROUGH A VIRTUAL HOUSE, DISCOVERING VARIOUS INSURANCE SCENARIOS AND COVERAGE OPTIONS IN AN INTUITIVE AND PLAYFUL MANNER. THE EXPERIENCE LEVERAGES 3D ENVIRONMENTS AND SMOOTH ANIMATIONS TO MAKE INSURANCE ACCESSIBLE AND ENGAGING FOR ALL AUDIENCES.

projects.title: IX CHEL ET KIN
mainContent: AN INTERACTIVE INSTALLATION INSPIRED BY MAYAN MYTHOLOGY, EXPLORING THE DUALITY BETWEEN IX CHEL, GODDESS OF THE MOON, AND KIN, GOD OF THE SUN. THIS PROJECT, CREATED AS PART OF THE CURRICULUM AT GOBELINS SCHOOL OF THE IMAGE, BLENDS ART AND TECHNOLOGY.

VISITORS ARE INVITED TO INTERACT WITH PROJECTED VISUALS AND PHYSICAL ELEMENTS, TRIGGERING CELESTIAL ANIMATIONS AND SOUNDSCAPES THAT BRING THE ANCIENT MYTHS TO LIFE. THE INSTALLATION CREATES AN IMMERSIVE SENSORY EXPERIENCE WHERE LIGHT AND SHADOW DANCE IN HARMONY WITH THE AUDIENCE'S MOVEMENTS.

projects.title: BOARD GAME - VRAIMENT?
mainContent: A HYBRID BOARD GAME AND COMPANION APP DESIGNED TO CHALLENGE PLAYERS' PERCEPTION OF TRUTH AND DECEPTION. CREATED AS A SCHOOL PROJECT AT GOBELINS, VRAIMENT? BRINGS A FRESH TWIST TO SOCIAL DEDUCTION GAMES.

PLAYERS GATHER AROUND THE PHYSICAL BOARD AND USE THE COMPANION APP TO GENERATE SCENARIOS, TRACK SCORES, AND UNLOCK SPECIAL GAME EVENTS. THE SEAMLESS BLEND OF TANGIBLE AND DIGITAL GAMEPLAY CREATES A UNIQUE SOCIAL EXPERIENCE THAT SPARKS DEBATE, LAUGHTER, AND UNFORGETTABLE MOMENTS AMONG FRIENDS.
